CMAKE_MINIMUM_REQUIRED(VERSION 2.8)

PROJECT(evpp)
ADD_SUBDIRECTORY("evpp")

PROJECT(mysqlpp)
ADD_SUBDIRECTORY("mysqlpp")

PROJECT(sqlite3)
ADD_SUBDIRECTORY("sqlite3")

PROJECT(nanopb)
ADD_SUBDIRECTORY("nanopb/win_cmake")

PROJECT(NF3rdCommon)
ADD_SUBDIRECTORY("common")

PROJECT(NFLuaBind)
ADD_SUBDIRECTORY("LuaBind")
